caption.title: Results of the Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Recovered-Dead model for mass infection. ( A) λ I = −6.3 days for Daegu was obtained by the difference between the actual epidemic peak d I.a = 25 days and the modeled epidemic peak d I.m = 31.3 days. ( B) λ I = −5.3 days for Gyeongbuk was obtained by the difference between the actual epidemic peak d I.a = 24 and the modeled epidemic peak d I.m = 29.3 days.
